title: Reverse - Novel Updates
tags: Character Growth   Cold Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Marriage of Convenience   Omegaverse   Wealthy Characters
author: 莲鹤夫人
description: In a typical ABO society, alphas are in dominant positions while omegas are merely child-bearing resources, laying in the palm of the alphas’ hands. There was no freedom, no human rights, and no right to regular education. Their main duty in life was to get pregnant and give birth. Until one day, everything reversed.>
